lead_paragraph: Homeowners dealing with defective wall board will be able to deduct the cost of repairs and replacement of damaged appliances, the first large-scale financial relief for thousands nationwide.
snippet: Homeowners dealing with defective wall board will be able to deduct the cost of repairs and replacement of damaged appliances, the first large-scale financial relief for thousands nationwide.

headline.main: A Tax Break for Replacing Bad Drywall
headline.print_headline: A Tax Break For Replacing Bad Drywall
